title: What's the features of Yamaha MT-15 ? Is it worth to buy? - Quora

response.answer_text: The features are: Slipper clutch, Single channel abs, Liquid cooling, 19.3 bhp and 14.7 nm torque, Variable valve actuation, Led taillight and headlight, 138 kgs (including full fuel and oil), Yes its a good buy over FZ-S and r15(if you dont like agressive riding position). Yes its a good buy because its a Yamaha. They could have given dual channel abs though. Always wear a helmet while riding and wish you miles of smiles
